dc_title_s: Above Ground Storage Tanks: Washington, D.C.
dc_description_s: SARA Title III Hazardous Material locations (above ground). The dataset contains locations and attributes of Hazardous MaterialsC. Office of the Chief Technology Officer (OCTO) and participating D.C. government agencies. A dataset listing provided by DC FEMS identified above ground Hazardous Material locations. The dataset provides and standardized address generated during geocoding as well as the original source address information. In addition <a href="http://geospatial.dcgis.dc.gov/dc_kmz/Metadata/ASTPt.html" target="_blank">Metadata
